snippet: At The Wall Street Journal, he was admired for stretching the restraints of financial journalism. He later used those skills in best-selling books like "The Last Lecture."
abstract: At The Wall Street Journal, he was admired for stretching the restraints of financial journalism. He later used those skills in best-selling books like "The Last Lecture."

headline.main: Jeffrey Zaslow, Author and Journalistic Role Model, Dies at 53
